ADTEXT_2.message: KIHÍVÁS: Hajó és legényéség kerestetik harci bevetésre a {system} rendszerben.

ADTEXT_3.message: HARC: Képzett, jól felszerelt zsoldost keresek.

ADTEXT_4.message: RETTENTHETETLEN ZSOLDOST KERESÜNK: megbízás {cash} - ért a {system} rendszerben.

AREA.description: An allotted area for the mission

BONUS_1.message: A megbízómra jó benyomást tettél, ezért átutalt {cash} jutalmat a küldetésért.

BONUS_2.message: Jó szolgálatot tettél. Kapsz is {cash} jutalmat.

BONUS_3.message: Lenyűgöző! Engedélyt kaptam egy kis bónusz, {cash} kredit kifizetésére.

BONUS_4.message: Elégedett vagyok a teljesítményeddel. Átutaltam a fizettségedet,  {cash}  kreditet.

DISTANCE.description: Distance in space, between two locations

FAILUREMSG_1.message: Szégyelheti magát. Tűnjön a szemem elől.

FAILUREMSG_2.message: Késtél! Nagy veszteséget okoztál. Nem kapsz fizetséget!

HARVESTING_1.message: Az {org} {cash}-ben fizet egy {mission} küldetésért a {system} rendszerben ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). Jó okunk van feltételezni, hogy egy könyörtelen versenytárs a felelős a szállítóhajóink eltűnéséért az {area}-ban. Az úticél távolsága {dist} fényév.

HARVESTING_2.message: Our market competitor is seriously claiming he has ownership of {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). The {org} totally disagree and is willing to pay {cash} for a combat mission at {area}. {area} is in a distance of {dist} ly.

HARVESTING_3.message: Please help! We received a distress call from one of our freighters orbiting {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). The call was interrupted, so we fear the worst. Distance to {system} is {dist} ly. The pay is {cash}.

HARVESTING_IT_MUST_BE_COMPLETED_BY.message: It's important that the mission is completed by {date}. Please keep quiet about this operation.

HARVESTING_LAND_THERE.message: We have a salesperson in every nearby star system. This person will get in contact with you when landed.

MILITARY_1.message: Military intelligence believe that a hostile faction has set up a secret listening outpost on {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). The government can not tolerate this and have approved a series of operations to wipe out this facility. The enemy tries to disguise its origin by using only civilian spacecraft types. We do it like this too! So we are willing to hire a mercenary for {cash}. {area} is located {dist} ly from here.

MILITARY_2.message: In response to a case of piracy in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), {dist} ly, the local authorities pay {cash} for a combat mission at {area}.

MILITARY_3.message: The counter intelligence corps needs a civil pilot who asks no questions for a {mission} mission in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), {dist} ly. Pay is {cash}.

MILITARY_IT_MUST_BE_COMPLETED_BY.message: A task force will be assembled to regain control of {area}. It's important that the mission is successfully completed by {date}.

MILITARY_LAND_THERE.message: Visit a station in the territory protected by the {org}!

MINING_1.message: The {org} is in a dispute with a rival company about {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). To push through our claims we need a reliable and combat experienced mercenary. We offer {cash} for the expenses. Distance to {system} is {dist} ly.

MINING_2.message: I'm a manager of the {org}. We need additional help in a longtime legal dispute with a competitor about the mining rights in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), {dist} ly. We lost patience and would like to speed things up outside of the courtroom. Your mission would be to jump to {area} for {cash}.

MINING_3.message: I work for the {org}. Some of our freighters will arrive shortly at {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). To increase the safety of our employees and to protect the equipment we are willing to pay {cash} for a {mission} mission. Distance to {area} is {dist} ly.

MINING_IT_MUST_BE_COMPLETED_BY.message: A convoy is enroute to {area}. It is essential that the mission is completed by {date}.

MINING_LAND_THERE.message: We have employees in every nearby star system. Just visit the nearest station and get in contact with the local office there.

MISSION_TYPE_3.description: Name of mission type. Derived from Fighter Sweep. An aggressive mission to hunt down and destroy every enemy fighter in the allotted area.

OBJECTIVE_1.message: It's not necessary to attack the enemy. We want data about the defence capability and response time.

OBJECTIVE_2.message: Weaken the enemy's strength as much as possible and then jump to safety.

OBJECTIVE_3.message: Clear the area around {area}. Break any resistance.

POLICE_1.message: Police detectives have discovered that a group of pirates try to establish a stronghold on {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}), {dist} ly. This must not happen. The local authorities pay {cash} for a mission to {area} as preparation of a police operation.

POLICE_2.message: The {org} will pay {cash} for a combat mission in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). We are short on pilots and ships. So this will be an opportunity for a loyal citizen to make money. The target is a small pirate base on {area}. You need hyperdrive propellant for {dist} ly and additional fuel for the return route.

POLICE_3.message: Our markets were flooded by contraband. The source has been traced back to a hidden base at {area} in the {system} system ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}). Only a distance of {dist} ly. Because of the reduced police budget the local authorities would like to outsource this mission and have allotted {cash} credits for this operation.

POLICE_IT_MUST_BE_COMPLETED_BY.message: It's important that the mission is completed by {date}, because more hostile ships are on there way.

POLICE_LAND_THERE.message: Elég, ha egy olyan helyen landolsz, ahol van {org} iroda.

RISK_1.message: The competitor has only limited resources. Nothing you can't handle.

RISK_2.message: The competitor has only minor resources. But he will defend his position if necessary.

RISK_3.message: Jól felszerelt a konkurencia. Tartsd nyitva a szemed!

RISK_4.message: The enemy is very well equiped and has access to the latest technology. Be careful!

SUCCESSMSG_1.message: I knew you were the right person for such a mission. Here is your payment.

SUCCESSMSG_2.message: Thank you for making it. I have transferred the money.

SUCCESSMSG_3.message: I hope you had no big trouble. I just paid you.

SUCCESSMSG_4.message: Very well done. I have paid the bill.
